projects.title: Garbage Detection Application using Deep Learning Techniques
projects.content: Garbage Detection Application is a deep learning, computer vision based projected performed in my final year of under-graduate degree. This application consists of two phases of development, each targetting the deep learning side and application development side. The first phase consisted of research, training and analysis of various object detection models on thousands of garbage images across several datasets. Simultaneously developed Flutter Mobile Application which used mobile's camera module to click images and run them using custom Tensorflow Lite model. This project was showcased along side a research paper on the same topic in the well-known IEEE journal (RTEICT)

projects.title: Epidemic Simulator
projects.content: Epidemic Simulator is a data simulation project built in Python using Object Oriented Programming. For simulating a world and people in it, object oriented programming is used and its instances are populated in a loop. The people are induced a certain random motion which simulates the randomness of our real world. A virus is simulated in this world using specific epidemiological paramters, like mortality rate, spread distance, infection time, etc. We calculate the Manhattan distance between each person and spread the virus accordingly. Matplotlib plots and animations are used to visualize this effort.
